text:
@realDonaldTrump Feb 26, 2020: "You have 15 people, and the 15 [cases] within a couple of days is going to be down to close to zero, that’s a pretty good job we’ve done." 

June 29, 2020: We have 2,549,069 reported cases and 125,803 reported deaths.

Incredible stupidity!

https://t.co/3VI1zawAXt
